item.title: Challenges in Choosing an APM tool for Fintech Companies in India due to RBI Guidelines
item.description: RBI has issued guidelines on storing payment system data of Indian users for fintech companies in India. All user data needs to be stored in India. This also applies to all third-party tools they use, including monitoring tools..

item.title: Setting up HA Prometheus with Cortex and Cassandra
item.description: In this blog, we explain how we enable high availability Prometheus using Cortex and Cassandra. This provides a single pane of view across multiple clusters - which enables visualising all monitoring metrics in one go.

item.title: Bringing out of the box application monitoring to Prometheus
item.description: Prometheus is a popular monitoring tool for kubernetes. Kube-state metrics and node exporters send a lot of metrics. But visualization of the metrics in charts is still painful. In this article, let's see how we can have some out of box visualizations with Prometheus.

item.title: Quantile Aggregation for statsd-exporter in Prometheus
item.description: In this blog, we shall send observation frequencies in the bucket intervals chosen and aggregate those at the Prometheus back-end.
